snippet.title: Strawhart Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Strawhart NOW on Steam: https://s.team/a/1085070

Start a cult and resurrect an ancient evil in Strawhart, an irresponsible action-puzzler in a beautiful stylized world. Test your ingenuity in multiple varied locales against the challenges they offer, discover a colorful cast of characters, and be on the lookout for a trove of secrets. Bend the environment to your will and conquer the land—but don’t tell your mother.

Join the Strawhart Discord: https://discord.gg/c8nnPXgYRP
Follow Strawhart on Twitter: https://twitter.com/strawhartgame
Follow Strawhart on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playstrawhart/
